title: Ransom My Heart
description: When he wasn't maddening her with desire, he was infuriating her with his words. She feared his touch because she longed for it, and she knew that she wouldn't be able to resist him again if he kissed her...When beautiful, feisty Finnula Crais kidnaps a knight on his way home from the Crusades, she has no idea that she's trapped the handsome new Earl of Stephensgate. But Hugo Fitzstephen is quite happy to be kidnapped, especially by such a spirited beauty. Before long, Finnula realizes she's out of her depth, because Hugp wants more than his freedom. He wants to possess her, body and soul. And Finnula's afraid of nothing -- except falling in love...Cover photograph by Christel Eldrim
author: Meg Cabot
